description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Attestation

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable Attestation

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema (template) on which the Verifiable Attestation is based

id.description: References the credential schema (template) stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Attestation is based

credentialStatus.description: Contains information about how to verify the status of the Verifiable Attestation (via the Revocation and Endorsement Registry, RER)

id.description: References record in the Revocation and Endorsement Registry (RER) to enable verification of a Verifiable Attestationâ€™s validity

type.description: Defines the Verifiable Credential status type

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the Verifiable Attestation

documentPresence.description: Defines how the document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Attestation issuance have been provided (e.g. physically, digitally)

evidenceDocument.description: Defines document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable Attestation issuance

id.description: References the issuance policy stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) that has been followed for issuing the Verifiable Attestation

subjectPresence.description: Defines if the Verifiable Attestation subject was physically present in the course of the verification

verifier.description: Defines entity which has verified documents before Verifiable Attestation issuance

expirationDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Attestation expires

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Attestation

issuanceDate.description: Defines when the Verifiable Attestation was issued

issuer.description: Defines the issuer of the Verifiable Attestation

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

jws.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

validFrom.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable Attestation becomes valid

title: EBSI Verifiable Attestation
